name: playwright-cucumber-framework
description: A scalable Playwright TypeScript automation framework using Cucumber BDD for web, mobile web emulation, and API testing.

scripts.allure:history: allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && allure open allure-report
scripts.allure:report: npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
scripts.test:complete: npm run allure:clean && npm test && npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
scripts.test:smoke:allure: npm run allure:clean && npm run test:smoke && npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
scripts.test:sanity:allure: npm run allure:clean && npm run test:sanity && npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
scripts.test:critical:allure: npm run allure:clean && npm run test:critical && npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
scripts.test:regression:allure: npm run allure:clean && npm run test:regression && npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
scripts.test:web:allure: npm run allure:clean && npm run test:web && npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
scripts.test:positive:allure: npm run allure:clean && npm run test:positive && npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
scripts.test:negative:allure: npm run allure:clean && npm run test:negative && npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
scripts.test:api:allure: npm run allure:clean && npm run test:api && npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
scripts.test:parallel:allure: npm run allure:clean && npm run test:parallel && npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
scripts.test:chromium:allure: npm run allure:clean && npm run test:chromium && npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
scripts.test:firefox:allure: npm run allure:clean && npm run test:firefox && npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
scripts.test:webkit:allure: npm run allure:clean && npm run test:webkit && npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
